choose.when: INSERT INTO TBL_USER (ID, USER_NAME, USER_NICKNAME, USER_EMAIL, USER_PHONE, USER_SCHOOL, USER_DIVISION, USER_POSITION, USER_AGE, USER_LOGIN_CODE, USER_PROFILE_NAME, USER_KAKAO_EMAIL, USER_KAKAO_PROFILE_URL) VALUES (#{id}, #{userName},#{userNickname}, #{userEmail}, #{userPhone}, #{userSchool}, #{userDivision}, #{userPosition}, #{userAge}, #{userLoginCode}, #{userProfileName}, #{userKakaoEmail}, #{userKakaoProfileUrl})
choose.otherwise: INSERT INTO TBL_USER (ID, USER_NAME, USER_EMAIL, USER_PASSWORD, USER_PHONE, USER_SCHOOL, USER_DIVISION, USER_POSITION, USER_AGE, USER_LOGIN_CODE) VALUES (#{id}, #{userName}, #{userEmail}, #{userPassword}, #{userPhone}, #{userSchool}, #{userDivision},#{userPosition}, #{userAge}, #{userLoginCode})

mapper.select: SELECT USER_PHONE FROM TBL_USER WHERE USER_PHONE = #{userPhone}
SELECT ID, USER_NAME, USER_NICKNAME, USER_EMAIL FROM TBL_USER WHERE USER_NAME = #{userName} AND USER_PHONE = #{userPhone}
SELECT ID FROM TBL_USER WHERE USER_EMAIL = #{userEmail} AND USER_PHONE = #{userPhone}
